text: Arturo Rojas de la Cámara (22 December 1930 – 8 January 2019) was a Spanish children's cartoonist. He worked for the Spanish newspaper Editorial Valenciana for a long time. Cámara was born on 22 December 1930 in Paterna, Spain and died on 8 January 2019 in Valencia, Spain at the age of 88. == References == Category:1930 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Spanish cartoonists Category:People from the Valencian Community
title: Arturo Rojas de la Cámara
